segment.source: View Profiles
segment.target: View Profiles

segment.source: View Profiles
segment.target: View Profiles

segment.source: View Profiles
segment.target: View Profiles

segment.source: A view profile stores a view layout that you can use to quickly start your analysis.
segment.target: A view profile stores a view layout that you can use to quickly start your analysis.

segment.source: After you customize the layout, you can save it as the startup profile or create a profile that you can apply at any time.
segment.target: After you customize the layout, you can save it as the startup profile or create a profile that you can apply at any time.

segment.source: View profiles are stored in .wpaprofile files and saved, by default, to the WPA Files folder under the user's Documents folder.
segment.target: View profiles are stored in .wpaprofile files and saved, by default, to the WPA Files folder under the user's Documents folder.

segment.source: For information about changing the view layout, see Change the View Layout.
segment.target: For information about changing the view layout, see Change the View Layout.

segment.source: Creating a Profile
segment.target: Creating a Profile

segment.source: To create a profile, first configure your view layout as you want it to appear, and then do the following:
segment.target: To create a profile, first configure your view layout as you want it to appear, and then do the following:

segment.source: In the menu, choose Profiles, Export….
segment.target: In the menu, choose Profiles, Export….

segment.source: Navigate to the desired location.
segment.target: Navigate to the desired location.

segment.source: Name your profile, and choose Save.
segment.target: Name your profile, and choose Save.

segment.source: Applying a Profile
segment.target: Applying a Profile

segment.source: To apply a profile to one or more open traces, do the following:
segment.target: To apply a profile to one or more open traces, do the following:

segment.source: In the menu, choose Profiles, Apply….
segment.target: In the menu, choose Profiles, Apply….

segment.source: In the pane that appears, choose Browse…
segment.target: In the pane that appears, choose Browse…

segment.source: to open a custom profile, or choose Browse Catalog…
segment.target: to open a custom profile, or choose Browse Catalog…

segment.source: to view a list of profiles that are shipped with WPA.
segment.target: to view a list of profiles that are shipped with WPA.

segment.source: Navigate to and select the desired profile, and choose Open.
segment.target: Navigate to and select the desired profile, and choose Open.

segment.source: If you have multiple traces open, or if the profile is configured for multiple traces, WPA asks you to associate traces with the profile.
segment.target: If you have multiple traces open, or if the profile is configured for multiple traces, WPA asks you to associate traces with the profile.

segment.source: Select the desired traces, and choose Apply.
segment.target: Select the desired traces, and choose Apply.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: WPA also maintains a list of most recently used profiles in the menu under Profiles, Apply Recently Used Profile.
segment.target: WPA also maintains a list of most recently used profiles in the menu under Profiles, Apply Recently Used Profile.

segment.source: Profile Catalog
segment.target: Profile Catalog

segment.source: WPA includes a set of profiles that help jumpstart different types of analysis.
segment.target: WPA includes a set of profiles that help jumpstart different types of analysis.

segment.source: These profiles are contained in the Profile Catalog that can be found when you apply a profile to an open trace:
segment.target: These profiles are contained in the Profile Catalog that can be found when you apply a profile to an open trace:

segment.source: AppLaunch
segment.target: AppLaunch

segment.source: FastStartup
segment.target: FastStartup

segment.source: FullBoot (Boot)
segment.target: FullBoot (Boot)

segment.source: FullBoot (Shutdown)
segment.target: FullBoot (Shutdown)

segment.source: Hibernate
segment.target: Hibernate

segment.source: HTMLApplicationAnalysis
segment.target: HTMLApplicationAnalysis

segment.source: PresetsForComparativeAnalysis
segment.target: PresetsForComparativeAnalysis

segment.source: Standby
segment.target: Standby

segment.source: XAMLApplicationAnalysis
segment.target: XAMLApplicationAnalysis

segment.source: Changing the Startup Profile
segment.target: Changing the Startup Profile

segment.source: You can also use your current view as the default profile that is used when you first open a trace:
segment.target: You can also use your current view as the default profile that is used when you first open a trace:

segment.source: In the menu, choose Profiles, Save Startup Profile.
segment.target: In the menu, choose Profiles, Save Startup Profile.

segment.source: Choose OK in the confirmation box that appears.
segment.target: Choose OK in the confirmation box that appears.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You cannot change the startup profile when multiple traces are open.
segment.target: You cannot change the startup profile when multiple traces are open.
